about.name: Cezar Guimarães Carneiro
about.description: Competent Full Stack Developer with 5+ years of experience with a true innovative atitude. Has experience in building highly scalable applications with modern patterns and technologies. Fluent in English and Portuguese.

work.title: Android Developer
work.description: I maintain and evolve Android apps that involve sales and billing with highly complex business logic. I design new functionalities, optimize performance and improve the app's usability. I am helping to bring the "Continuous Integration" practice and testing tools and techniques to the teams. As a result, we are making better products by gaining software maintainability and trustability.

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: I worked mainly in a Corporate Search Engine written in Java on top of Apache Solr/Lucene that processed huge amounts of data by indexing all sorts of documents and databases. To maintain it, my team and I were always applying patterns and technologies to achieve high scalability and availability. Still at Dataeasy, I acted in the design and implementation of RESTful APIs with Jersey 2, did front-end development with AngularJS and Angular2.

work.title: Trainee Developer
work.description: I worked in a corporate search engine written in Java. I did back-end development dealing with indexing technologies such as Apache Solr/Lucene and did front-end development using the toolchain GWT (Google Web Toolkit).

work.title: Trainee Developer
work.description: Worked in a software project written in Java that utilized JSP (JavaServer Pages) on top of Struts 2 and the PostgreSQL Database. Besides the development of the application, I became capable of handling all the infrastructure of the application, managing configuration and resources, doing deploys, backups, etc. The application was available to the entire state and had users from all of the bank's agencies.
